The match cannot be played! The squad contains prohibited players!
Translation in appropriate language: Nie można rozegrać meczu! W składzie występują niedozwoleni zawodnicy!

Orginal text in English: You get two job offers from clubs:
Translation in appropriate language: Otrzymujesz dwie propozycje pracy na stanowisku managera od klubów:

Orginal text in English: In which club do you want to work (enter the appropriate number):
Translation in appropriate language: W którym klubie chcesz pracować (wpisz odpowiedni numer):

Orginal text in English: You took up a job at club
U Change formation         P Swap players
Translation in appropriate language: U Zmiana ustawienia         P Zamiana zawodników

Orginal text in English: I Team instructions        R Show reserve
Translation in appropriate language: I Instrukcje dla drużyny    R Pokaż rezerwowych

Optionally comments: Comment: 'In' from 'Injury', must be 2 characters, it's indicator that the footballer is injured
Comment: 'T' from 'Transfer', must be 1 character, it's indicator that the footballer is on the transfer list

Orginal text in English: Enter the number, space, second number and press Enter:
Translation in appropriate language: Podaj numer Lp., spacja, drugi numer i Enter:

Orginal text in English: P Swap players         G Details     S Sort
Translation in appropriate language: P Zamiana zawodników   G Szczegóły   S Sortuj

Orginal text in English: T Traditional view   G Details     S Sort
Translation in appropriate language: T Tradycyjny widok   G Szszegóły   S Sortuj

Orginal text in English: Skills: G-%d, D-%d, M-%d, A-%d     Goals: %d
Translation in appropriate language: Umiejętności: B-%d, O-%d, P-%d, N-%d     Gole: %d

Orginal text in English: Number of days to heal the injury:
The contract will expire in: %d day(s)
Are you sure you want to kick %ls%ls from the club? (Y/n):
Translation in appropriate language: Czy na pewno chcesz wyrzucić %ls%ls z klubu? (T/n):

Orginal text in English: Tomorrow, the contract of %ls%ls will expire.
Enter for how many years the contract will apply (1, 2 or 3):
Translation in appropriate language: Podaj przez ile lat ma obowiązywać kontrakt (1, 2 lub 3):

Orginal text in English: %ls: I agree to the proposed terms of the contract.
Translation in appropriate language: %ls: Zgadzam się na proponowane warunki kontraktu.

Orginal text in English: %ls: I reject the proposed terms of the contract.
D   Selection of players for individual training
Translation in appropriate language: D   Dobór zawodników do treningu indywidualnego

Orginal text in English: You need to fill 3 types of training..
What do you want to train? (%d remaining):
SELECTION OF PLAYERS FOR INDIVIDUAL TRAINING
There are no matches played yet

Matches results of the I League -
Remaining matches of the I League -
D Next    F Filters  K Player purchase
Translation in appropriate language: D Dalej   F Filrty   K Kupno zawodnika

Orginal text in English: M Relative to the minimum price: from $%.2f
Translation in appropriate language: M Względem ceny minimalnej:  od %.2f zł.

Orginal text in English: X Relative to the maximum price: from $%.2f
Translation in appropriate language: X Względem ceny maksymalnej: do %.2f zł.

Orginal text in English: Back to MENU - press any key...
T Request for additional funds for transfers
Translation in appropriate language: T Prośba o dodatkowe fundusze na transfery

Orginal text in English: Management: We agree at your request. We hope you will use the funds wisely and strengthen our team.
Translation in appropriate language: Zarząd: Zgadzamy się na pańską prośbę. Mamy nadzieję, iż rozsądnie wykorzysta pan fundusze i wzmocni zespół.

Orginal text in English: If the display time of messages during the match is not adequate to the Speed settings, change the option below to Manual.
Translation in appropriate language: Jeżeli czas wyświetlania komunikatów w czasie meczu jest nieadekwatny do ustawień Szybkości, zmień poniższą opcję na Ręczne.

Orginal text in English: Displaying subsequent messages during the match is to take place:
Translation in appropriate language: Wyświetlanie kolejnych komunikatów w czasie meczu odbywać ma się:

Orginal text in English: Now you can't play a match!
